GSD.product_version: versions from v4.20 to before v6.1.7
GSD.description:
drm/vmwgfx: Remove rcu locks from user resources

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.7 by commit 7ac9578e45b20e3f3c0c8eb71f5417a499a7226a, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit e14c02e6b6990e9f6ee18a214a22ac26bae1b25e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/vmwgfx: Remove rcu locks from user resources
